question: 伝説
sourceMnemonic: Let me <kanji>transmit</kanji> to you a <kanji>theory</kanji>... a theory that perhaps a great <vocabulary>legend</vocabulary> is true.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. You just have to remember that <ja>伝</ja> is read as <ja>でん</ja> in this case. Just imagine yourself sitting in your <reading>den</reading> (<ja>でん</ja>) as you get cozy and listen to this theory about a great <vocabulary>legend</vocabulary>.
